biotools.summary: Protein and nucleotide sequence repeat identification and masking. Screens query sequences against a reference collection of repeats and "censors" (masks) homologous portions with masking symbols, as well as generating a report classifying all found repeats.

bioschemas.name: CENSOR (EBI)
bioschemas.summary: Protein and nucleotide sequence repeat identification and masking. Screens query sequences against a reference collection of repeats and "censors" (masks) homologous portions with masking symbols, as well as generating a report classifying all found repeats.
